words.source: H559 (אָמַר, qal wayyiqtol 3fp) with conjunctive waw; KJV/ESV/NASB 'they said'
H376 (אִישׁ, noun common masculine singular absolute); KJV 'an Egyptian', ESV 'an Egyptian', NASB 'an Egyptian'
H4713 (מִצְרִי, gentillic masculine singular absolute); KJV/ESV/NASB 'Egyptian'
H5337 (נָצַל, hiphil perfect 3ms + 1cp suffix); KJV 'delivered us', ESV 'rescued us', NASB 'delivered us'
H3027 (יָד, noun common feminine singular construct) with preposition min; KJV/ESV/NASB 'from the hand of' / 'out of the hand of'
H7462 (רָעָה, qal participle masculine plural absolute) with article; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the shepherds'
H1571 (גַּם, adverb) with conjunctive waw; KJV 'also', ESV 'even', NASB 'he even'
H1802 (דָּלָה, qal infinitive absolute); emphatic construction; KJV 'drew water enough', ESV 'even drew water', NASB 'even drew the water'
H1802 (דָּלָה, qal perfect 3ms); inf. abs. + finite verb = emphatic: 'he indeed drew'; KJV 'drew', ESV 'drew', NASB 'drew'
H8248 (שָׁקָה, hiphil wayyiqtol 3ms) with conjunctive waw; KJV 'watered', ESV 'watered', NASB 'watered'
H853 (אֵת, direct object marker); untranslated in English
H6629 (צֹאן, noun common feminine singular absolute) with article; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the flock'
